name: Pupyro

abilities.name: Ember Spirit
abilities.desc: Increase the possessor's Fire-type moves' power to 50%.

abilities.name: Sharp Claws (Secret)
abilities.desc: Increase the power of the possessor's Claw-typed moves by 30%.

description: Flamound are tougher and stronger than their pre-evolution. Their natural instinct always tells them to find a worthy owner before they can proceed further in anything. Usually, that stubbornness makes it very hard for them to evolve.

moves_level.name: Growl
moves_level.effect: Let out a growl that lowers the opponent(s)' Melee Attack by one stage.

moves_level.name: Fire Ball
moves_level.effect: Blast a fire ball at the opponent.

moves_level.name: Bite
moves_level.effect: Bite the opponent with vicious fangs. This move has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Melee Defense stat.

moves_level.name: Howl
moves_level.effect: Howl to increase the spirit, raising the user's Melee Attack stat.

moves_level.name: Fire Chomp
moves_level.effect: Chomp at the opponent with flame-cloaked fangs. This move has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Melee Defense stat and 10% chance to leave a burn.

moves_level.name: Headbutt
moves_level.effect: Recklessly headbutt the opponent that also hurt the user by a quarter of the damage dealt. This move also has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

moves_level.name: Intimidate
moves_level.effect: Frighten the target with a scary face to lower the target's Melee Attack.

moves_level.name: Take Down
moves_level.effect: Recklessly slam into the opponent but also hurt the user by a quarter of the damage dealt. This move has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

moves_level.name: Flame Charge
moves_level.effect: Charge at the opponent in a cloak of flame. This move has a 30% chance to raise the user's Speed stat and 10% chance to leave the target with a burn.

moves_level.name: Ground Stomp
moves_level.effect: Strongly stomp down on the ground to strike everything around the user, foes and allies. This move lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

moves_tutor.name: Dodge
moves_tutor.effect: Dodge upcoming attack(s), but reduce success rate by 50% if used consecutively with any other evasion moves.

moves_tutor.name: Rest
moves_tutor.effect: Rest for 2 turns. Each turn restores the user's HP by 50% and Stamina by 25%. This move also removes all status condition.

moves_tutor.name: Fire Breath
moves_tutor.effect: Scorch the opponent with an intense blast of fire. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

moves_tutor.name: Electric Chomp
moves_tutor.effect: Chomp at the opponent with electrified fangs. This move has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Melee Defense stat and 10% chance to leave it with paralysis.

moves_tutor.name: Sand Attack
moves_tutor.effect: Hurl sand at the opponent, reducing the target's accuracy by one stage.

moves_tutor.name: Burrow
moves_tutor.effect: Burrow into the ground and attack the next turn. The user becomes untargetable by all non-Earth typed moves during this turn.
